entry: Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research notes led to a new instance of this Pokémon being created in the Galar region.
name: type-null

entry: It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth. The mask placed upon it limits its power in order to keep it under control.
name: type-null

entry: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.
name: silvally

entry: Although its name was Type: Null at first, the boy who evolved it into this form gave it the name by which it is now known.
name: silvally

entry: This is its form once it has awakened and evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is greatly increased.
name: silvally

entry: A solid bond of trust between this Pokémon and its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within Silvally. It can change its type at will.
name: silvally

entry: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.
name: silvally

entry: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.
name: minior

entry: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokémon was born from mutated nanoparticles.
name: minior

entry: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokémon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.
name: minior

entry: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.
name: komala

entry: The log it holds was given to it by its parents at birth. It has also been known to cling to the arm of a friendly Trainer.
name: komala

entry: It stays asleep from the moment it’s born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.
name: komala

entry: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.
name: turtonator

entry: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.
name: turtonator

entry: It lives in volcanoes and eats sulfur and other minerals. Materials from the food it eats form the basis of its explosive shell.
name: turtonator

entry: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
name: turtonator

entry: Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes explosive compounds to develop in its shell. Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.
name: turtonator

entry: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.
name: togedemaru

entry: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.
name: togedemaru

entry: When it’s surprised or agitated, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.
name: togedemaru

entry: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
name: togedemaru

entry: When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges electricity indiscriminately.
name: togedemaru

entry: After going to all the effort of disguising itself, its neck was broken. Whatever is inside is probably unharmed, but it’s still feeling sad.
name: mimikyu

entry: If its neck is broken or its rag torn during an attack, it works through the night to patch it.
name: mimikyu

entry: It stands in front of a mirror, trying to fix its broken neck as if its life depended on it. It has a hard time getting it right, so it’s crying inside.
name: mimikyu

entry: There will be no forgiveness for any who reveal that it was pretending to be Pikachu. It will bring the culprit down, even at the cost of its own life.
name: mimikyu

entry: Its disguise made from an old rag allowed it to avoid an attack, but the impact broke the neck of the disguise. Now everyone knows it’s a Mimikyu.
name: mimikyu

entry: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.
name: bruxish

entry: It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder’s shell is no match for it.
name: bruxish

entry: It burrows beneath the sand, radiating psychic power from the protuberance on its head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.
name: bruxish

entry: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.
name: drampa

entry: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
name: drampa

entry: If a child it has made friends with is bullied, it will find the bully’s house and burn it to the ground.
name: drampa

entry: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
name: drampa

entry: it is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.
name: drampa

entry: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.
name: dhelmise

entry: The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves became reborn as this Pokémon. It maintains itself with new infusions of seabed detritus and seaweed.
name: dhelmise

entry: It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks away their vitality. It only likes to go after big prey like Wailord.
name: dhelmise

entry: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.
name: dhelmise

entry: After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.
name: dhelmise

entry: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where it lives.
name: jangmo-o

entry: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. it grow little by little as they battle one another.
name: jangmo-o

entry: It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.
name: jangmo-o

entry: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
name: jangmo-o

entry: it strikes its scales to communicate with others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s become as hard as metal.
name: jangmo-o

entry: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.
name: hakamo-o

entry: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they’re regrown.
name: hakamo-o

entry: It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, it attacks.
name: hakamo-o

entry: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
name: hakamo-o

entry: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.
name: hakamo-o

entry: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.
name: kommo-o

entry: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.
name: kommo-o

entry: When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.
name: kommo-o

entry: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
name: kommo-o

entry: Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors wearing armor made of it scales.
name: kommo-o

entry: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
name: tapu-koko

entry: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.
name: tapu-koko

entry: Although it’s called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.
name: tapu-koko

entry: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.
name: tapu-lele

entry: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.
name: tapu-lele

entry: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
name: tapu-lele

entry: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.
name: tapu-bulu

entry: The guardian deity of Ula’ula is a lazy Pokémon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns.
name: tapu-bulu

entry: Although it’s called a guardian deity, it’s violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.
name: tapu-bulu

entry: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.
name: tapu-fini

entry: The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.
name: tapu-fini

entry: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
name: tapu-fini

entry: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.
name: cosmog

entry: In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It’s said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known.
name: cosmog

entry: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn’t seem to care.
name: cosmog

entry: This Pokémon came from another universe. Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle breeze can blow it away.
name: cosmog

entry: it is very curious but not very cautious, often placing itself in danger. If things start to look dicey, it teleports away.
name: cosmog

entry: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.
name: cosmoem

entry: There’s something accumulating around the black core within its hard shell. People think this Pokémon may come from another world.
name: cosmoem

entry: The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the “cocoon of the stars” and built an altar to worship it.
name: cosmoem

entry: The absorption of starlight fuels this Pokémon’s growth. The shell that encases it is harder than any known material.
name: cosmoem

entry: It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate, frantically building up energy within its core as preparation for evolution.
name: cosmoem

entry: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.
name: solgaleo

entry: This Pokémon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog. At the activation of its third eye, it departs for another world.
name: solgaleo

entry: Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.
name: solgaleo

entry: When light radiates from its body, this Pokémon could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel any darkness and light up the world.
name: solgaleo

entry: it was once known as the Beast That Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light radiates boundlessly from it.
name: solgaleo

entry: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.
name: lunala

entry: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.
name: lunala

entry: Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name “the beast that calls the moon.”
name: lunala

entry: Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this Pokémon lives by taking in any and all light and converting it into its own energy.
name: lunala

entry: It steals the light from its surroundings and then becomes the full moon, showering its own light across the night sky.
name: lunala

entry: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.
name: nihilego

entry: One of the Ultra Beasts. It’s unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.
name: nihilego

entry: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.
name: nihilego

entry: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
name: buzzwole

entry: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.
name: buzzwole

entry: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
name: buzzwole

entry: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.
name: pheromosa

entry: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
name: pheromosa

entry: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
name: pheromosa

entry: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.
name: xurkitree

entry: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity.
name: xurkitree

entry: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
name: xurkitree

entry: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.
name: celesteela

entry: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.
name: celesteela

entry: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.
name: celesteela

entry: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.
name: kartana

entry: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.
name: kartana

entry: This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
name: kartana

entry: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.
name: guzzlord

entry: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it appears to be eating constantly, but for some reason its droppings have never been found.
name: guzzlord

entry: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
name: guzzlord

entry: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
name: necrozma

entry: Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams.
name: necrozma

entry: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It’s apparently from another world.
name: necrozma

entry: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.
name: necrozma

entry: It needs light to survive, and it goes on a rampage seeking it out. Its laser beams will cut anything to pieces.
name: necrozma

entry: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.
name: magearna

entry: Its mechanized body is merely a vessel. Its true self is its Soul-Heart, an artificial soul.
name: magearna

entry: It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.
name: magearna

entry: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.
name: marshadow

entry: It lurks in the shadows of others, copying their movements and powers. This Pokémon is craven and cowering.
name: marshadow

entry: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it’s imitating.
name: marshadow

entry: By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts master and copying their movements, this Pokémon learned the ultimate techniques.
name: marshadow

entry: This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow, so it went undiscovered for a long time.
name: marshadow

entry: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
name: poipole

entry: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
name: naganadel

entry: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
name: stakataka

entry: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
name: blacephalon

entry: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
name: zeraora

entry: It runs as fast as lightning strikes, shredding its opponents with its high-voltage claws.
name: zeraora

entry: Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs. Wherever it runs, lightning flashes and thunder echoes.
name: zeraora

entry: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.
name: meltan

entry: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
name: meltan

entry: They live as a group, but when the time comes, one strong it will absorb all the others and evolve.
name: meltan

entry: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
name: melmetal

entry: At the end of its life-span, it will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
name: melmetal

entry: Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. it is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.
name: melmetal

entry: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.
name: grookey

entry: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.
name: grookey

entry: The faster a it can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
name: thwackey

entry: When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.
name: thwackey

entry: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
name: rillaboom

entry: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.
name: rillaboom

entry: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.
name: scorbunny

entry: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.
name: scorbunny

entry: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.
name: raboot

entry: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.
name: raboot

entry: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.
name: cinderace

entry: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.
name: cinderace

entry: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.
name: sobble

entry: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.
name: sobble

entry: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.
name: drizzile

entry: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.
name: drizzile

entry: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.
name: inteleon

entry: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.
name: inteleon

entry: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
name: skwovet

entry: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.
name: skwovet

entry: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.
name: greedent

entry: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
name: greedent

entry: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.
name: rookidee

entry: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.
name: rookidee

entry: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.
name: corvisquire

entry: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.
name: corvisquire

entry: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.
name: corviknight

entry: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region’s airborne taxi service.
name: corviknight

entry: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.
name: blipbug

entry: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.
name: blipbug

entry: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
name: dottler

entry: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.
name: dottler

entry: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.
name: orbeetle

entry: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what’s around it—and what’s around it can include things over six miles away.
name: orbeetle

entry: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.
name: nickit

entry: Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.
name: nickit

entry: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.
name: thievul

entry: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.
name: thievul

entry: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.
name: gossifleur

entry: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.
name: gossifleur

entry: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.
name: eldegoss

entry: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.
name: eldegoss

entry: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
name: wooloo

entry: If its fleece grows too long, it won’t be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.
name: wooloo

entry: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
name: dubwool

entry: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
name: dubwool

entry: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.
name: chewtle

entry: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
name: chewtle

entry: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.
name: drednaw

entry: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
name: drednaw

entry: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.
name: yamper

entry: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.
name: yamper

entry: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. it can run nonstop for three full days.
name: boltund

entry: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.
name: boltund

entry: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.
name: rolycoly

entry: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.
name: rolycoly

entry: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.
name: carkol

entry: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: carkol

entry: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: coalossal

entry: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.
name: coalossal

entry: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.
name: applin

entry: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
name: applin

entry: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.
name: flapple

entry: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.
name: flapple

entry: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.
name: appletun

entry: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.
name: appletun

entry: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
name: silicobra

entry: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
name: silicobra

entry: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.
name: sandaconda

entry: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.
name: sandaconda

entry: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.
name: cramorant

entry: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.
name: cramorant

entry: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.
name: arrokuda

entry: After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant swallows it up.
name: arrokuda

entry: This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
name: barraskewda

entry: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.
name: barraskewda

entry: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.
name: toxel

entry: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.
name: toxel

entry: Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokémon looks down on all that would challenge it.
name: toxtricity

entry: It has an electrical organ on its chest. While generating electricity, it fills its surroundings with what sounds like the strumming of a bass guitar.
name: toxtricity

entry: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.
name: sizzlipede

entry: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.
name: sizzlipede

entry: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
name: centiskorch

entry: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
name: centiskorch

entry: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.
name: clobbopus

entry: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back. It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.
name: clobbopus

entry: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
name: grapploct

entry: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.
name: grapploct

entry: The swirl pattern in this Pokémon’s body is its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses its shape, and it gets dizzy.
name: sinistea

entry: It absorbs the life-force of those who drink it. It waits patiently, but opportunities are fleeting— it tastes so bad that it gets spat out immediately.
name: sinistea

entry: Trainers it trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.
name: polteageist

entry: When angered, it launches tea from its body at the offender’s mouth. The tea causes strong chills if swallowed.
name: polteageist

entry: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.
name: hatenna

entry: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.
name: hatenna

entry: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.
name: hattrem

entry: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.
name: hattrem

entry: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.
name: hatterene

entry: If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.
name: hatterene

entry: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.
name: impidimp

entry: It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.
name: impidimp

entry: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.
name: morgrem

entry: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.
name: morgrem

entry: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.
name: grimmsnarl

entry: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
name: grimmsnarl

entry: Its voice is staggering in volume. it has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.
name: obstagoon

entry: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.
name: obstagoon

entry: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.
name: perrserker

entry: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.
name: perrserker

entry: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.
name: cursola

entry: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You’ll become stiff as stone if you touch it.
name: cursola

entry: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.
name: sirfetchd

entry: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.
name: sirfetchd

entry: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
name: mr-rime

entry: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.
name: mr-rime

entry: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.
name: runerigus

entry: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.
name: runerigus

entry: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
name: milcery

entry: They say that any patisserie visited by it is guaranteed success and good fortune.
name: milcery

entry: The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
name: alcremie

entry: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a bitter flavor.
name: alcremie

entry: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass’s orders are absolute.
name: falinks

entry: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.
name: falinks

entry: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.
name: pincurchin

entry: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.
name: pincurchin

entry: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.
name: snom

entry: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.
name: snom

entry: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: frosmoth

entry: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
name: frosmoth

entry: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.
name: stonjourner

entry: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.
name: stonjourner

entry: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.
name: eiscue

entry: This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.
name: eiscue

entry: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.
name: indeedee

entry: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.
name: indeedee

entry: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.
name: morpeko

entry: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
name: morpeko

entry: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.
name: cufant

entry: If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.
name: cufant

entry: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.
name: copperajah

entry: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.
name: copperajah

entry: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.
name: dracozolt

entry: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.
name: dracozolt

entry: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.
name: arctozolt

entry: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.
name: arctozolt

entry: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.
name: dracovish

entry: Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.
name: dracovish

entry: Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.
name: arctovish

entry: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.
name: arctovish

entry: Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.
name: duraludon

entry: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
name: duraludon

entry: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, it wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.
name: dreepy

entry: If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if it has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.
name: dreepy

entry: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.
name: drakloak

entry: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
name: drakloak

entry: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.
name: dragapult

entry: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.
name: dragapult

entry: Now armed with a weapon it used in ancient times, this Pokémon needs only a single strike to fell even Gigantamax Pokémon.
name: zacian

entry: Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King’s Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.
name: zacian

entry: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master’s Shield. It was feared and respected by all.
name: zamazenta

entry: Now that it’s equipped with its shield, it can shrug off impressive blows, including the attacks of Dynamax Pokémon.
name: zamazenta

entry: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows it to stay active.
name: eternatus

entry: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
name: eternatus

entry: it trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.
name: kubfu

entry: If it pulls the long white hair on its head, its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up from the depths of its belly.
name: kubfu

entry: People call it the embodiment of rage. It’s said that this Pokémon’s terrifying expression and shout will rid the world of malevolence.
name: urshifu

entry: The energy released by this Pokémon’s fists forms shock waves that can blow away Dynamax Pokémon in just one hit.
name: urshifu

entry: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.
name: zarude

entry: Once the vines on Zarude’s body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.
name: zarude

entry: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It’s said that removing the rings on Regieleki’s body will unleash the Pokémon’s latent power.
name: regieleki

entry: Its entire body is made up of a single organ that generates electrical energy. it is capable of creating all Galar’s electricity.
name: regieleki

entry: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago’s arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.
name: regidrago

entry: Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. it is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.
name: regidrago

entry: it emits intense cold from its hooves. It’s also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.
name: glastrier

entry: it has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.
name: glastrier

entry: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one—it doesn’t use its sense of sight. Spectrier’s kicks are said to separate soul from body.
name: spectrier

entry: As it dashes through the night, it absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.
name: spectrier

entry: it is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.
name: calyrex

entry: it is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
name: calyrex
